column3:
“Purchased from World of Weed Tacoma
Flower: beautiful smaller sized nuggets. Nothing extraordinary in color or frost. 
Smell: piney kush earthiness. What I would  expect from the parent strains. 
Crumble: good and fluffy. 
Burn: even and clean. 
Taste: on exhale you get the OG Kush dominance. Piney and fresh. 
High: all other things about this strain are average but the high is not. It is superb. This knocks you on y...”

“This is the first stain that I tried about six months after the retail stores opened.  Last time I really smoked was about 20 years ago.  Let's just say after a smallish bowl , it was like floating in front of a freight train then getting your body completely pulverized into a pink mist.  I chuckled as I found myself walking in circles a few times.  Yes it is that good.  I have tried about 30 strains since then and o...”

“I wouldn't recommend this for new smokers or occasional smokers. SMOG will get you about as high as you can get. So, just be prepared for that. Also wouldn't recommend smoking before doing anything important, because SMOG WILL make you sleepy and hungry, which leads to grumpy. It's great stuff though.”

“I started sampling different strains quite a bit this summer.  I'm a fan of heavy indica blends as well as sativa, and any hybrid in between.  I've tried about 20 strains in the last few months. !  ;)  .. I freakin love Supermax OG.  It's 70/30 Indica dominant and some people do feel like they get sleepy on it of course.  However...the relaxed yet pronounced euphoria and calming is so enjoyable that it puts me in the...”

“5/5

If I was stranded on a desert island with an unlimited supply of one strain this would be it.

This was by blue roots. #1 grower imo. This flower is what you see on the front page of high times for the month of April. Perfect strain for me. Not a good strain for the light smokers. Frosty wet lime green crystals with minimal dark to pine green long narrow leaves with long thin orange hairs. Very stinky like a tox...”
“Dopest dope I've ever smoked hands down the king of strains”
“supermax og from Trumed is straight fire. Everything you want with an Og. Deep og flavor is over the top good.”

“Supermax og is so good, leafly is about to add a supermax og symbol to the right of the fifth star for this cultivar. 
Smoking buds of Supermax og by blue roots in wa feels and has me react like a dab. This reminds me of super potent kind home grown. Really good weed is sticky. It's so good, it's slightly oily. Terps list at 3.6% to 4.3%. THC 23.3% and up. Dispensaries go through this so quick, if it ain't world of w...”
“As dank as it gets. SMX OG has the most intense OG, Piney scent and flavor as you could ever want. Highly recommended.”
“Fire. And no joke. I mean no joke. The volcano took it to a whole different playing field !! Not for any beginner. ! Huge hitter. Get this if you can handle”

“At first smell it's strong pine with what smells to me like orange zest or citrus . Once I grind it the skunk gets strong in this one. Seriously smooth and strong enough to pass on the second bowl. Thank you to my friends at Tru Med for the suggestion.”

“Supermax og is so good, leafly is about to add a supermax og symbol to the right of the fifth star for this cultivar. 
Smoking buds of Supermax og by blue roots in wa feels and has me react like a dab. This reminds me of super potent kind home grown. Really good weed is sticky. It's so good, it's slightly oily. Terps list at 3.6% to 4.3%. THC 23.3% and up. Dispensaries go through this so quick, if it ain't world of w...”
“Love this strain! I'm usually a indica girl but the smooth hitsailing from this is just the right mix of mellow and creative! I love it any smoker should at least try Supermax once!”
“It's a perfect mellow body high.... I love this strain to get moving round in the mornin and it has a very nice flavor as well...”
“such a heavy hitter. tons of giggles. amazing cerebral tingling. top 3 favorite material”
“Great for arthritis and pain. Must know what you're doing with this strain. Effects last for few hours I recommend not to use any machinery with this strain. Sit back and relax, take the day off.”

“A True OG for the OG seeking bud lover. A very stinky and distinctive smell of pine and skittles and everything about that kush stench once you open the jar. This flower burns beautifully white ash and tastes delicious until the last toke. Bong was my weapon of choice.”
“TruMed Az.  Thanks, that SuperMax OG is awesome. I HIGHLY recommend it to any OG fan.”
“This is my all time favorite.... Super relaxing great for that night time sleep aid. I always keep this on hand :)”

“I love powerhouse strains!!! Supermax OG is a must for insomniacs, people with eating problems, or overall pain management. It lives up to its Supermax name with a high THC content (around 23% in Az), these buds are frosty, sticky, and reek of that lovely OG stank on steroids!!”
“If you find it try it!!!! Really, really nice!”
“Classic O.G taste a heavy hitter from the nice dense nugs.  Heavy body high knocked me out after I enjoyed the serene high body and mind.”
“Very effective for my insomnia. Did a wonderful job relaxing me mentally which leads to a great night sleep”

“functional stain yet calm and enlightening. great for work. piney earthy taste. my wife said it almost like hypsy gypsy smells. very smooth super brite green even more frosty inside and out. try it if its the real thing. buds were gigantic 4 and 5 gramers no stems just one thin one in the middle.”
“really tight big buds sweet smell great taste great high if you havent tried it yet defiantly try it you wont be disappointed one of my new favorites”

“Definitely one of my favorite strains, helps with my insomnia a lot.
Very relaxing, and puts you to sleep, also helps my anxiety and depression. Taste was earthy, but I do recommend this to anyone who suffers from insomnia. High was nice, nice strong strain.”

“This is one of the most amazing strains I've ever smoked. I deal with debilitating chronic pain, anxiety and depression and this gorgeous flower really helps me to relax, function and also sleep.
It's potent so start slow until you get right to where you want to be. Be prepared for thoughtful dreaminess and a great feeling of overall well being!”

“Great aroma, flavor, and overall high. My eyes are red as the devils dick yet my mind is a lucid as be. If you can find it, smoke it. 
-if you can clone, try mating with some Dirty Girl. a Mega Dirty Girl" every so often never hurts.”"

“Bought this from The Evergreen Market in Auburn, wanted to try something new and don't typically like hybrids, more indica than anything else. Got home and loaded a bowl, i enjoyed the small sized nugs because the fit perfectly in my piece. Taste was really earthy but the high floored me. It was a little stonier in the head than i typically like but the body high was really great too. Found it a good option while i s...”
“VERY CHILL. Mellow, not dumb, thoughtful, content.”
“Great for arthritis and pain. Must know what you're doing with this strain. Effects last for few hours I recommend not to use any machinery with this strain. Sit back and relax, take the day off.”
“When trying to save some money this Indy will do the job.   A dark green look with a fair OG scent.  A bit leafy and stemy .. but surprisingly pretty good!”
“This is my favorite strain to date...  This will put you into a super relaxed state of mind. I used to have a sleeping problem.. not any more :)”
“An euphoric freight train of goodness . Plows down migraines , vertigo , nausea .”

“The very first time I tried this strain I got the most mind numbing rush of euphoria and found myself wandering my living room. The whole ride took me to the edge and back. Later on I felt like every molecule in my body burst and all my energy drained through my feet and into the floor. It was crazy.”
“such a heavy hitter. tons of giggles. amazing cerebral tingling. top 3 favorite material”
“It's a perfect mellow body high.... I love this strain to get moving round in the mornin and it has a very nice flavor as well...”
“Very Amazing buds, Very good high. Recommend for sure💯”
“Great strain. Good and stoney but won't leave you trapped on the couch all night.”
“Real Supemaxx smells like a black lady's purse and a hobos ass crack though, I dig it”
